org.bluecove.socket
Class LocalServerSocket

java.lang.Object
  java.net.ServerSocket
      org.bluecove.socket.LocalServerSocket

public class LocalServerSocket
extends java.net.ServerSocket

Unix domain server socket on Linux. Inheritance from java.net.ServerSocket is mainly for documentation consistency.
